duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop comprehensive business cases for cost/benefit analysis of proposed initiatives to drive product and program strategy.
Utilize data-driven forecasting techniques to produce benefit forecasts using given variables.
Create and maintain business case reporting to identify forecasted vs. actual performance trends.
Monitor performance trends and identify drivers of underperforming tools and initiatives.
Support the development of Statements of Work through cost projection and benefits assessment.
Develop executive dashboards with simple user interfaces utilizing organizationally approved BI tools.
Automate executive reporting by creating coding scripts that pull data directly from source systems on scheduled intervals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent in a related field (Master's preferred)
